attributes.action: Vote for George osborne to resign from post
attributes.background: In light of the recent budget.George Osborne wants to make cuts to Disabled benefits.which leads to more suffering and hardship to the needy.People of the U.K have been disgraced from this heartless attack.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
